00013 using namespace std;

00015 void FleeingPredator::update(Predator* owner, const list<Prey*>& movedPrey, const list<Prey*>& stateChangedPrey)
00016 {
00017     Utils* utils = Utils::get();
00018 
00019     Prey* optimalPrey = NULL;
00020     hgeVector optimalPosition(0, 0);
00021     hgeVector position = owner->getPosition();
00022 
00023     list<Prey*>::const_iterator iter1;
00024 
00025     for (iter1 = movedPrey.begin(); iter1 != movedPrey.end(); ++iter1)
00026     {
00027         if (owner->canSee(*iter1) || owner->canHear(*iter1))
00028         {
00029             if (optimalPrey == NULL)
00030             {
00031                 optimalPrey = *iter1;
00032                 optimalPosition = optimalPrey->getPosition();
00033             }
00034             else
00035             {
00036                 if (utils->distanceBetween(position, (*iter1)->getPosition()) < utils->distanceBetween(position, optimalPosition))
00037                 {
00038                     optimalPrey = *iter1;
00039                     optimalPosition = optimalPrey->getPosition();
00040                 }
00041             }
00042         }
00043     }
00044 
00045     if (optimalPrey != NULL)
00046     {
00047         if (optimalPrey->getCurrentBehaviorState() != CAUTIOUS || owner->getHungerFactor() > 1.4)
00048         {
00049             owner->setHeading(utils->angleDegrees(utils->angleBetween(position, optimalPosition)));
00050             owner->setBehaviorState(PURSUING);
00051 
00052             double distance = utils->distanceBetween(position, optimalPosition);
00053             if (distance <= owner->getMaxAttackDistance())
00054             {
00055                 if (utils->getRandomDouble(0.0, (0.5 + distance / owner->getMaxAttackDistance())) < .6)
00056                     owner->attack(optimalPrey);
00057             }
00058 
00059             owner->move(1.1 + owner->getHungerFactor() / 5);
00060         }
00061         else
00062         {
00063             owner->setHeading(-utils->angleDegrees(utils->angleBetween(position, optimalPosition)));
00064             owner->move(1.1 + owner->getHungerFactor() / 5);
00065         }
00066     }
00067     else
00068     {
00069         owner->setBehaviorState(PASSIVE);
00070         int rand = utils->getRandomInt(0, 2000);
00071 
00072         if (rand < 60)
00073             owner->setHeading(utils->getRandomInt(0, 359));
00074 
00075         if (owner->getHungerFactor() >= 0.8)
00076         {
00077             rand = utils->getRandomInt(0, 2000 - (owner->getHungerFactor() * 1500));
00078             if (rand <= 10)
00079                 owner->move(0.5 + owner->getHungerFactor() / 3.5);
00080         }
00081     }
00082 }
